propulsion.name: Propulsion
propulsion.description: Research improving propulsion efficiency reduces energy costs for orbital access, building, and resource collection.

tiers.name: SpaceX Raptor 3 Engines
tiers.description: Full-flow staged combustion methalox engines with 350s vacuum ISP.

tiers.name: Vacuum Rated Nozzles
tiers.description: Extended bell nozzles optimized for vacuum operation, improving ISP to 380s.

tiers.name: Single Stage To Orbit
tiers.description: Lightweight propulsion systems enabling single-stage orbital insertion.

tiers.name: Aerospike Engines
tiers.description: Altitude-compensating aerospike nozzles for optimal efficiency at all altitudes.

tiers.name: Expander Cycle Engines
tiers.description: Hydrogen-fueled expander cycle engines with exceptional efficiency.

tiers.name: Dual-Mode Propulsion
tiers.description: Air-breathing and rocket-mode hybrid engines for atmospheric operations.

tiers.name: Rotating Detonation Engines
tiers.description: Continuous detonation wave propulsion for higher thermodynamic efficiency.

tiers.name: Solar Thermal Propulsion
tiers.description: Concentrated solar energy heats propellant for 800s+ ISP.

tiers.name: Solid Core Nuclear Thermal
tiers.description: NERVA-type fission reactor heats hydrogen propellant to 900s ISP.

tiers.name: Liquid Core Nuclear Thermal
tiers.description: Molten uranium core enables 1300s ISP with rotating containment.

tiers.name: Gas Core Nuclear Thermal
tiers.description: Gaseous fission core with transparent containment achieves 3000s+ ISP.

tiers.name: Nuclear Pulse Propulsion
tiers.description: Orion-type external nuclear pulse drives for massive delta-v.

tiers.name: Ion Thrusters
tiers.description: Electric propulsion using ionized xenon for 3000-5000s ISP.

tiers.name: Hall Effect Thrusters
tiers.description: Magnetic acceleration of ionized propellant with higher thrust.

tiers.name: VASIMR Engines
tiers.description: Variable Specific Impulse Magnetoplasma Rocket with adjustable thrust/ISP.

tiers.name: Magnetoplasmadynamic Thrusters
tiers.description: High-power MPD arcs accelerate plasma for deep space missions.

tiers.name: Fusion Propulsion
tiers.description: Direct fusion drives with 10,000s+ ISP and substantial thrust.

tiers.name: Magnetic Confinement Fusion
tiers.description: Tokamak-derived fusion propulsion with plasma exhaust.

tiers.name: Inertial Confinement Fusion
tiers.description: Laser or Z-pinch ignition fusion pulses for propulsion.

tiers.name: Antimatter-Catalyzed Fusion
tiers.description: Antimatter triggers fusion reactions for enhanced energy release.

tiers.name: Beam-Core Antimatter
tiers.description: Direct antimatter annihilation exhaust for maximum energy density.

tiers.name: Photon Drives
tiers.description: Pure photon emission propulsion approaching theoretical limits.

tiers.name: Quantum Vacuum Thrusters
tiers.description: Propulsion derived from quantum vacuum fluctuations.

tiers.name: Alcubierre Warp Drives
tiers.description: Spacetime metric manipulation for effective faster-than-light travel.

tiers.name: Perfect Propulsion
tiers.description: Ultimate propulsion systems operating at physical limits.

robotics.name: Robotics
robotics.description: Research improving robotic manipulation capabilities increases mining and building rates.

tiers.name: Basic Manipulators
tiers.description: Simple robotic arms for basic operations.

tiers.name: Servo Actuators
tiers.description: Precision servo motors for fine control.

materials.name: Materials Science
materials.description: Research improving material strength and durability.

structures.name: Structures
structures.description: Research improving manufacturing rates, construction efficiency, and material recovery.

generation.name: Energy Generation
generation.description: Research improving solar energy collection and generation efficiency.

storage_density.name: Storage Density
storage_density.description: Research improving energy storage capacity and efficiency.

conversion.name: Energy Conversion
conversion.description: Research improving energy conversion efficiency and thermal management.

transmission.name: Energy Transmission
transmission.description: Research enabling wireless energy transmission across vast distances.

architecture.name: Architecture
architecture.description: Research improving computational architecture, system design, and information processing paradigms.

tiers.name: Von Neumann Architecture
tiers.description: Classic stored-program computer architecture with unified memory.

tiers.name: Harvard Architecture
tiers.description: Separate instruction and data memory buses for parallel access.

tiers.name: Systolic Arrays
tiers.description: Rhythmic data flow through processing element grids.

tiers.name: Dataflow Architecture
tiers.description: Data-driven execution without central program counter.

tiers.name: Neuromorphic Mesh
tiers.description: Brain-inspired spiking neural network hardware topology.

tiers.name: Cellular Automata Fabric
tiers.description: Massively parallel local interaction computing substrate.

tiers.name: Hypercube Interconnect
tiers.description: N-dimensional hypercube topology for logarithmic routing.

tiers.name: Reservoir Computing
tiers.description: Recurrent neural networks with fixed random dynamics.

tiers.name: Topological Qubit Mesh
tiers.description: Error-protected quantum computing via non-Abelian anyons.

tiers.name: Entangled Photon Storage Ring
tiers.description: Circulating entangled photon pairs for quantum memory and computation.

tiers.name: Majorana Condensed Qubit Memory
tiers.description: Topologically protected Majorana zero-mode quantum registers.

tiers.name: Adiabatic Reversible Logic
tiers.description: Thermodynamically reversible computation approaching Landauer limit.

tiers.name: Strange Matter Processor
tiers.description: Computation using stable strange quark matter configurations.

tiers.name: Holographic Compute Boundary
tiers.description: Information processing on AdS/CFT holographic surfaces.

tiers.name: Closed Timelike Curve Compute
tiers.description: Computational acceleration via controlled causal loops.

tiers.name: Omega Point Architecture
tiers.description: Asymptotically infinite computation as universe evolves.

tiers.name: Bekenstein-Bounded Pocket Universe
tiers.description: Maximum information density computation in baby universe bubbles.

processor.name: Processor
processor.description: Central processing unit improvements increase computational power and efficiency.

tiers.name: Adiabatic Reversible Processors
tiers.description: Thermodynamically reversible processors approaching zero energy dissipation.

memory.name: Memory
memory.description: Memory and data storage improvements enable better information retention and access.

sensors.name: Sensors
sensors.description: Research improving sensor systems and data transmission bandwidth.
